const uint64_t IMAGES[] = {
  0x1c08080808080c08,
  0x3e0408102020221c,
  0x1c2220201820221c,
  0x20203e2224283020,
  0x1c2220201e02023e,
  0x1c2222221e02221c,
  0x040404081020203e,
  0x1c2222221c22221c,
  0x1c22203c2222221c,
  0x1c2222222222221c
};
const int IMAGES_LEN = sizeof(IMAGES)/8;
